episode_event_ch0264_00_satoshi01/4001_1: This young man is Ash, from Pallet Town.

Together with his partner Pikachu, he battles and
catches Pokémon.

He’s been training hard to prepare for the
Masters Eight Tournament.

But he got too caught up in his training, and
before he knew it, he found himself
somewhere new...
Maybe we trained a little too hard...

Hey, that must be a new Trainer! I haven’t seen
him here before.
Aw, man... I can’t take it anymore...
Ack! He fainted! Hey, are you OK?
episode_event_ch0264_00_satoshi01/4201_1:
To prepare for the Masters Eight Tournament,
we’ll be training here on Pasio for a while.

We’re gonna get even stronger, so let’s give it
our all, Pikachu!
episode_event_ch0264_00_satoshi01/4002_1:
Mmm, that food was great! That was a huge
help! Thanks!

Just how much food do you intend to stuff into
that stomach of yours? Have you no manners?

Hmph. This is why I can’t stand Trainers who
wear hats.
Uh... So, could you explain what this place is?

What?! You came here knowing nothing?
Then listen up!

This is Pasio, an artificial island where the
greatest Trainers gather and compete to decide
who’s the best!

Here, Trainers form sync pairs with their
Pokémon and battle in teams of three!

And I am none other than the creator of Pasio,
Lear! I’m going to become a king who treasures
the power of bonds!

You’d do well to remember that name!
Bwahahahahaha!

Whoa, really? So Trainers from all over the world
come here? And you’re, like, the king and creator
of this place?! That’s so cool!
Heh. Let that sink in!

Whether or not you meant to come to Pasio,
you’re here now.

You must be confident in your battling skills,
I assume?
Of course! I’m really good at battling!
Come on out, everyone!

So you’re not just talk. I can tell you’ve raised
those Pokémon well.
What’s your name?

I’m Ash, from Pallet Town! My dream is to become
a Pokémon Master!
A Pokémon Master? How intriguing.

By the way, we’ve been training for this thing
called the Masters Eight Tournament!

If you don’t mind us being here, could we stay on
Pasio for a while?
I don’t care. Do as you please.
Awesome! Thanks, Lear!
Young Master! It’s about time.
Oh, you’re right.

Sorry, I have to take my leave now. If you have
any questions about Pasio, you can ask
[Name:PlayerNickname ] and the others.
OK!

Thanks, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! And...what
was your name again?
I’m Tina! Let’s do our best together, Ash!
Yeah! Nice to meet you!
Oh! Wait, Lear! One more thing!

Once you’re done with whatever you’re busy with,
let’s have a battle!
Certainly! I’ll give you a taste of my true power!
episode_event_ch0264_00_satoshi01/4003_1: Whoa! So that’s a sync move, huh!
I wanna try that, too! I wonder if I can do it!
You got a Poryphone earlier, didn’t you?

Yup! There’s supposed to be something called a
sync stone in there. It turns the strength of your
bond with your Pokémon into power, right?
Yep! I’m sure you’ll be able to do it in no time!

Especially if you’re such good friends with
your Pikachu!

We gotta stay sharp if we wanna keep up, don’t
we, Flareon? C’mon, let’s take ’em on!
Sure thing! Ready when you are, Tina!

Thanks! Now it’s time for our sync move!
Take this!

What’s the matter? If you’re not gonna use your
move, then I guess it’s our turn!

Wow, that’s amazing, Ash! You were able to use
your sync move right away!
Really? That was it?! We did it, Pikachu!
episode_event_ch0264_00_satoshi01/4004_1: I wonder why your sync move didn’t work, Tina.
Well...maybe we just need to practice more.
This hasn’t really happened to us before, though...

Let’s do our best so we don’t lose next
time, Flareon.
Hey, cut it out! No fighting!

I know you’re frustrated that we lost, but you
can’t just be rude—
Whoa!
Ah! Where are you going, Flareon?!
What’s up with him?!
Do you usually have fights like that with Flareon?
No, not at all.

Well...I guess we never really fought when he
was an Eevee...

But ever since he evolved into Flareon, he’s
gotten a bit feisty.
I wonder why...

Don’t worry, Tina. Flareon’s just going through
a rebellious stage.
A rebellious stage?

Yeah. Y’see, I’ve traveled around a lot and caught
tons of different Pokémon.

Everyone’s got their own personality, so I’ve
seen it all!

I’ve butted heads with my Pokémon every now
and then...just like how you and Flareon are
right now!

But I was determined to get along with them!
So I did my best to tell my Pokémon how I felt!

Once I started doing that, we started to
understand each other better, and now we get
along just fine!

Even Pikachu and I had our differences when we
first met. Isn’t that right, buddy?

So don’t worry! I’m sure the two of you will
be fine!
’Cause Flareon’s really important to you, right?

Let’s go find Flareon! I’m sure he’s feeling lonely
without you by now!
Yeah!
episode_event_ch0264_00_satoshi01/4005_1:
I saw everything. Your Trainer just abandoned
you, didn’t she.

Hey, no need to be wary of us! We’re on
your side!

How about we team up to get back at your
Trainer, hm?
episode_event_ch0264_00_satoshi01/4006_1: Oh, do you have an idea where Flareon went?

Right now, there are some bad people on
this island.

My friends and the other folks on Pasio have been
pitching in to keep watch, but lots of Trainers have
had their Pokémon stolen!
I hope they didn’t take Flareon...
You’ll never get your Flareon back!

They’re those villains who’ve been trying to mess
with our tournaments and steal our Pokémon!

Hey, you! What do you mean when you said
Tina will never get Flareon back?
Heheheh! THIS is what I meant!
episode_event_ch0264_00_satoshi01/4007_1:
This Flareon is completely done with its Trainer!
It’s on our side now!
How about I prove it in battle, then?
I can’t just go all out against a friend’s Pokémon!

Heh. What, having some trouble? If you don’t get
serious soon, there’s no way you can beat us!
Hold it right there! You stay out of this!

Do you hate me so much that you joined
Team Break?
You’ve gotta tell him how you feel!

I’m so sorry! I’m a terrible Trainer who couldn’t
understand your feelings!

I wanna be by your side! No matter what
happens, that’ll never change!

Even if we can’t use our sync move...and no
matter who we lose to...it doesn’t matter!
I hate being apart from you!

We’ll just have to finish you off before you turn
on us!
You’re Tina’s partner. Nobody could replace you.
And you hate being apart from her, too, right?

I’m not letting you get away with what
you’ve done!

Hmph! We’re not done yet! We’ve got tons of
Pokémon to—
Oh, you still wanna battle? We don’t mind.
episode_event_ch0264_00_satoshi01/4008_1:
I guess Flareon thought you were gonna get taken
away from him, Tina.
That’s why losing to Pikachu made him so upset.
Oh, really? Is that true, Flareon?
See? I think he’s feeling a little sorry about that.
Hey. Do you wanna have another battle?

The best way to feel better when you’re feeling
down is to have a battle!

I wanna see your teamwork now that you’re not
fighting anymore!
episode_event_ch0264_00_satoshi01/4009_1: That Trainer with the hat... Ash, was it?

He’s already gotten used to the Pokémon battles
here on Pasio.

Yeah. He totes didn’t have aaaany issues
taking down Team Break.
I knew I saw something in that one.
That Trainer has a great deal of potential.

I’m looking forward to seeing what he can do in
a serious battle.
